name: Human Computer Interaction
description:
This is a collection of 6 short online courses which cover an introduction to HCI, the courses cover establishing user requirements, evaluation of interactive systems, hierarchical task analysis, user evaluations and designing for a diversity of users.

To prove completion of the course and interaction with the materials, students must submit their study notes and 5 practical exercises, these are marked as submitted or not, they are not assessed.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of self assessed knowledge

criteria.narrative: Participants must complete the 6 online courses and associated exercises to be awarded the digital badge.
